titles.title: Every Vote Counts Amendment

Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to abolish the electoral college and to provide for the direct popular election of the President and Vice President of the United States.
Every Vote Counts Amendment

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Every Vote Counts Amendment - Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the popular election of the President and Vice President under a new electoral system.
(Abolishes the electoral college.)
